items.title: Introduction to Game Localization
items.headline: Become a translator, tester or project manager specialized in gamelocalization and get paid for your gaming passion
objectives_summary: Examine the challenges you’ll face in each stage of the game localization process and choose where you’d like to work
Compare the pros and cons of working in-house or as a freelancer and select your ideal lifestyle
Learn how to spend more time translating and less worrying about technical issues

items.title: Unreal Engine:  Open World Landscapes
items.headline: Master Unreal Engine 4's Landscape editing tools to create massive environments like in "Breath of the Wild"
objectives_summary: How to download, install, and setup a project in Unreal Engine 4
How to create new landscapes
How to import existing (real world!) landscapes

items.title: Game Writing: Storytelling through Video Game Design
